description: This file contains tests for the Qwik template project initialization and configuration, using pytest fixtures and functions to verify project structure, content replacement, external script execution, and configuration loading.

classes.name: ProjectConfig
classes.description: Configuration data class for project settings and parameters.

classes.name: ProjectType
classes.description: Enumeration of supported project types, including QWIK.

classes.name: TemplateInitInfo
classes.description: Data class representing template initialization information.

classes.name: ProjectInitializer
classes.description: Main class responsible for initializing projects based on templates and configs.

classes.name: TemplateProvider
classes.description: Class providing templates from a specified source directory.

classes.name: QwikTemplate
classes.description: Template class specific to Qwik projects, providing init info and project setup methods.

methods.name: temp_dir()
methods.description: Fixture creating a temporary directory for test outputs.

methods.name: template_dir(temp_dir)
methods.description: Fixture creating a mock template directory with necessary files and structure for Qwik templates.

methods.name: project_config(temp_dir)
methods.description: Fixture generating a sample project configuration object.

methods.name: test_qwik_init_info(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Test to verify that template initialization info is correctly retrieved.

methods.name: test_project_initialization(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Test that project setup creates the correct files and content.

methods.name: test_post_processing_execution(template_dir, project_config, temp_dir)
methods.description: Test that post-processing scripts are executed as expected.

methods.name: test_config_file_loading(temp_dir)
methods.description: Verify that configuration can be loaded correctly from a JSON file.

methods.name: test_template_variable_replacement(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Test that placeholders in template files are correctly replaced with project parameters.
